definition: to equip/to fit out/to get ready (for a journey)/to arrange (clothes) to be ready
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to get ready (for a journey)/ready and waiting

pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: You can be showered and ready to go in 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 男人只要花10分鐘就能洗完澡，整裝待發。

sentences.english: Utopia, meanwhile, has gone on the warpath.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，同時烏有之鄉則整裝待發。

sentences.english: Lazio are in command but we can still bounce back.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧整裝待命，但是我們依然能夠翻盤。

sentences.english: Apple's products are shrink-wrapped and ready to go.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司的產品已整裝待發，準備迎戰。

sentences.english: Is the dressing ready to take on the week?
sentences.chinese: 是否已經爲了週中的比賽整裝帶發？

sentences.english: “The team is ready to go, ” Mr. Leinbach said.
sentences.chinese: “隊伍正整裝待發，”萊恩巴克先生說。

sentences.english: All the products are adopted by equi ed or easy-removing packing.
sentences.chinese: 所有產品採用整裝或脫卸式包裝。

sentences.english: The Yongjin Oilfield had been explored to be a large oilfield with in-place volume of hundreds millions ton in Junggar Basin.
sentences.chinese: 準噶爾盆地永進油田爲儲量規模上億噸的整裝油田。

sentences.english: The pumping unit on our carriages are self contained and there are no hoses over the pantograph.
sentences.chinese: 鋸座上的抽取裝置爲整裝式，受電弓上沒有軟管。

sentences.english: Apple’s products are shrink-wrapped and ready to go.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果的產品已經整裝待發，準備殺向戰場。

sentences.english: Cycling Association of cars in front of friends ready to start.
sentences.chinese: 車友們在自行車協會門前整裝出發。

sentences.english: Having the self-loading and unloading capability on the military vehicle can improve greatly the maneuverability.
sentences.chinese: 整裝自卸車能有效提高軍用裝備的機動性。

sentences.english: Beyond the couch, cattle owners prepare a calf for the show ring.
sentences.chinese: 沙發後面的牛主和牛犢爲出場比賽而整裝待發。

sentences.english: The Palestinians are equipped to become a developed country.
sentences.chinese: 現在，巴勒斯坦科學界正在向發達國家整裝待發。

sentences.english: No combat ready unit has ever passed inspections .
sentences.chinese: 沒有整裝待命的單位能通過檢閱。

sentences.english: Chengdao oilfield is the first developed epicontinental sea monoblock oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 埕島油田是我國投入開發的第一個淺海整裝大油田。

definition: to get ready (for a journey)/ready and waiting
to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
to stand guard/to serve on sentry duty
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
to dress (troops)/to line up (to arrange in a straight line)
to repay a debt in kind or by labor
